Name: Cool Cats
About the game: Cool Cats This is a side view platformer. The player controls 3 cats with different abilities and types of attacks. The player can switch between characters and progress through parts of the level. The peculiarity of the game is that you need to combine the abilities of the heroes to complete the level. There are also 6 types of enemies, some are immune to certain character attacks and you need to find the right weapon against certain enemies.
